      • transfer

        public static TransferResult transfer(RawTransaction transaction)
                               throws ClientIOException
        Transfer amount, raw transaction will be encoded by rlp encoder and convert to hex string with prefix "0x". Then the hex string will be packaged into TransferRequest bean object and serialized to JSON string.
        Parameters:
        transaction - RawTransaction raw transaction to to send
        Returns:
        TransferResult
        Throws:
        ClientIOException - network error, 5xx http status means request error, 4xx http status means no enough gas or balance.

      • deployContract

        public static TransferResult deployContract(String contractHex,
                                            int gas,
                                            byte gasCoef,
                                            int expiration,
                                            ECKeyPair keyPair)
        Deploys a smart contract to the blockchain.
        Parameters:
        contractHex - the hexadecimal string of the contract code to be deployed.
        gas - the gas limit to be used for the transaction.
        gasCoef - the gas coefficient utilized for calculating the transaction fee.
        expiration - the expiration time for the transaction, measured in blocks.
        keyPair - the key pair used to sign the deployment transaction.
        Returns:
        the result of the contract deployment, encapsulated in a TransferResult, which includes the transaction ID.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the provided contract hex string is null.

      • deployContract

        public static TransferResult deployContract(String contractHex,
                                            int gas,
                                            BigInteger maxPriorityFeePerGas,
                                            BigInteger maxFeePerGas,
                                            int expiration,
                                            ECKeyPair keyPair)
        Deploys a contract to the blockchain using the provided parameters.
        Parameters:
        contractHex - the contract hex string to be deployed to the blockchain.
        gas - the gas limit to be used for the transaction.
        maxPriorityFeePerGas - the maximum priority fee (tip) per gas, used for faster inclusion in blocks.
        maxFeePerGas - the maximum fee for the transaction, which includes the base fee and the priority fee.
        expiration - the expiration time for the transaction, in blocks.
        keyPair - the key pair to sign the deployment transaction, containing the private key.
        Returns:
        TransferResult representing the result of the contract deployment, including the transaction ID.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the contract hex string is null.

      • invokeContractMethod

        protected static TransferResult invokeContractMethod(ToClause[] toClauses,
                                                     int gas,
                                                     byte gasCoef,
                                                     int expiration,
                                                     ECKeyPair keyPair)
                                              throws ClientIOException
        Invokes a method on a smart contract and sends the transaction to the blockchain.
        Parameters:
        toClauses - an array of ToClause representing transaction clauses, detailing the target address, value, and additional data.
        gas - the gas limit to be consumed by the transaction.
        gasCoef - the gas coefficient used to calculate the transaction fee.
        expiration - the expiration time for the transaction, measured in blocks.
        keyPair - the ECKeyPair used to sign the transaction, containing the private key.
        Returns:
        TransferResult representing the result of the transaction, including its transaction ID.
        Throws:
        ClientIOException - if a network error occurs or if chainTag or bestRef cannot be fetched.
        ClientArgumentException - if any input parameter (gas, gasCoef, expiration, toClauses, or keyPair) is invalid.

      • invokeContractMethod

        protected static TransferResult invokeContractMethod(ToClause[] toClauses,
                                                     int gas,
                                                     BigInteger maxPriorityFeePerGas,
                                                     BigInteger maxFeePerGas,
                                                     int expiration,
                                                     ECKeyPair keyPair)
                                              throws ClientIOException
        Invokes a method on a smart contract and sends the transaction to the blockchain.
        Parameters:
        toClauses - an array of ToClause representing transaction clauses, detailing the target address, value, and additional data.
        gas - the gas limit to be consumed by the transaction.
        maxPriorityFeePerGas - total vtho in wei willing to spend as a validator tip.
        maxFeePerGas - total vtho in wei willing to spend on the transaction.
        expiration - the expiration time for the transaction, measured in blocks.
        keyPair - the ECKeyPair used to sign the transaction, containing the private key.
        Returns:
        TransferResult representing the result of the transaction, including its transaction ID.
        Throws:
        ClientIOException - if a network error occurs or if chainTag or bestRef cannot be fetched.
        ClientArgumentException - if any input parameter (gas, gasCoef, expiration, toClauses, or keyPair) is invalid.
